Errore recuperende su token de intrada OAuth.
translations.Integration of Zammad user support/ticke: Integratzione de sa solutzione Zammad de suportu utente/gestione tickets
translations.Zammad integration provides a dashboard:
S'integratzione Zammad frunit unu trastu de iscrivania chi ti mustrat notìficas de importu,
	unu frunidore de chirca de ticket e notìficas pro ticket abertos noos.
translations.If you want to allow your Nextcloud user: Si boles permìtere a is utentes tuos de Nextcloud de impreare OAuth pro s'identificare in una istàntzia de Zammad, crea un'aplicatzione in is impostatziones de amministratzione de Zammad e inserta•nche s'ID de s'aplicatzione (AppId) e su segretu inoghe a suta.
translations.Make sure you set the \"Callback URL\" t: Segura·ti de impostare "URL pro torrare a cramare" a
translations.Client secret of your application: Segretu de su cliente de s'aplicatzione tua
translations.Failed to save Zammad admin options: No at fatu a sarvare is sèberos amministrativos de Zammad
translations.To create an access token yourself, go t: Pro creare unu token de atzessu tue etotu, bae a sa setzione "Token de Atzessu" de sa pàgina de su profilu Zammad tuo.
translations.Create a \"Personal Access Token\" and g: Crea unu "Token de Atzessu Personale" e ativa is permissos "TICKET -> AGENTE", "AMMINISTRATZIONE -> OGETU" and "PREFERÈNTZIAS_UTENTE -> NOTFICAS"
translations.Warning, everything you type in the sear: Avisu: totu su chi iscries in s'istanca de chirca s'at a imbiare a s'istàntzia Zammad tua.
translations.Enable unified search for tickets: Ativa chirca unificada pro is tickets
translations.Enable notifications for open tickets: Ativa is notìficas pro is eventos pro tickets abertos
translations.Successfully connected to Zammad!: Connètidu a Zammad in manera curreta!
translations.OAuth access token could not be obtained: No at fatu a otènnere su token de intrada OAuth:
translations.Failed to save Zammad options: No at fatu a sarvare is sèberos de Zammad
translations.Failed to save Zammad OAuth state: No at fatu a sarvare s'istadu OAuth de Zammad
translations.Failed to get Zammad notifications: No at fatu a retzire is notìficas de Zammad
